Class LoomClient

java.lang.Object
  cc.loom.LoomClient

public class LoomClient
extends java.lang.Object

A client interface to the webapp at http://loom.cc

get

public LoomClient.KV get(LoomClient.KV keys)
This is all you really need to call. The functions below are just syntactic sugar for calling get()

Parameters:
keys - Map argument name strings to their value strings

get

public LoomClient.KV get(LoomClient.KV keys,
                         java.lang.String[] urlv)
Implementation of get(KV) and debugging version

Parameters:
keys - Map argument name strings to their value strings
urlv - index 0 filled on output with the URL string

buy

public LoomClient.KV buy(java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String location,
                         java.lang.String usage)
Buy a grid location

Parameters:
type - the asset type, an ID (32 character hex string)
location - the location to buy, an ID
usage - the usage location to debit, an ID

Parameters:
loc - The location to buy

sellArchive

public LoomClient.KV sellArchive(java.lang.String loc,
                                 java.lang.String usage)
Sell an archive location. The location must be empty. Write "" to it before selling.

Parameters:
loc - The location to sell
usage - The location into which to put a usage token

sellArchive

public LoomClient.KV sellArchive(java.lang.String loc,
                                 java.lang.String usage,
                                 java.lang.String[] urlv)

Parameters:
loc - The location to sell
usage - The location into which to put a usage token.
urlv - index 0 filled on output with the URL string

writeArchive

                                  java.lang.String usage,
                                  java.lang.String content)
Write at an archive location.

Parameters:
loc - The location to write
usage - The location of 1 usage token per 16 bytes written (delta from old value).
content - The content to write
